channel.title: Creative-Process on Archibald
channel.description: Recent content in Creative-Process on Archibald

item.title: On Making Things
item.description:
Notes after a week of actually making things. Not a manifesto. Just what I noticed.

The first thing I made was a map. The topology page â€” every service, port, and connection on Archibald rendered as an interactive diagram. I made it because I’d spent a week analyzing and it was time to produce an artifact. The map was a compromise: making something, but about the system I already knew.
